docs.title: Home Page
docs.text:
Data Science Projects 🌟 Welcome to My Portfolio! 🌟

Hi there! 🖐

I'm Krzysztof, and I'm thrilled to have you here on my site. 🌐 Dive in, explore, and discover what makes this space unique. Your visit means a lot! 🚀

About Me

Currently, I am focused on enhancing my analytical skills and expanding my toolkit by:

  • Python 🐍
  • SQL 🗃️
  • Pandas 🐼
  • Tableau/Power BI 📊
My Current Job

I work as a GL Accountant 📒 where my main responsibilities include:

  • Preparing reports and reconciliations 📊
  • Ensuring accurate entries in SAP 💻
  • Optimizing efficiency in work through macros, formulas, and scripts 💡
My Education

I hold a master's degree in Accounting and Economic Analytics, which has equipped me with a solid foundation in financial management and analytical skills. 🎓

docs.title: App Data Playground
docs.text:
AI Data Science Learning App 🌟 Welcome to My Data Science Learning App! 🌟

Hello! 🖐

Welcome to the revolutionary app that leverages artificial intelligence to teach data science through an engaging chat interface. 🚀 Start your journey into the world of data science with personalized support. Please see github link here.

About the App

Our app offers three unique modes to cater to your learning style:

  • Normal Mode: Traditional lessons and exercises to build your data science knowledge step by step.
  • Game Mode: Embark on an exciting adventure where you learn data science concepts through quests and challenges. 🕹️
  • Chat Settings Creator: Customize your learning experience by adjusting chat settings to fit your preferences. ⚙️
Key Features

Our app includes the following features to enhance your learning experience:

  • Interactive Chat Lessons 💬
  • Personalized Feedback and Support 🤖
  • Engaging Quizzes and Challenges 📊
  • Customizable Learning Paths 📚

Friendship App 🌟 Welcome to My Friendship App! 🌟

Hello! 🖐

Welcome to the ultimate app for finding and making new friends. 🌐 Connect, explore, and build meaningful relationships with people who share your interests. Please see linki to this this app here. Please see github link here. 🚀

docs.title: Tablo Project
docs.text:
Tableau Project 🌟 Welcome to My Tableau Project! 🌟

Hello! 🖐

Welcome to my Tableau project where data comes to life through interactive visualizations. 🚀 Dive into the world of data insights with personalized support. Explore the project on Tableau Public here.

About the Project

This Tableau project offers in-depth analysis and visualization of sales data. Key features include:

  • Sales Performance: Track sales performance over time and identify trends.
  • Customer Insights: Gain insights into customer behavior and preferences.
  • Product Analysis: Analyze product performance and inventory levels.
Key Features

Explore the following features to enhance your understanding of the data:

  • Interactive Dashboards 📊
  • Data Filters and Drill-Downs 🔍
  • Customizable Views 📈
